sections.heading: Michigan College of Mines; Board of Control, Presiding Officer, Title Change.
sections.text:
The presiding officer of the board of control of the Michigan college of mines who is now designated as president shall hereafter be designated as chairman.

History:1905, Act 174, Imd. Eff. June 7, 1905 ;-- CL 1915, 1308 ;-- CL 1929, 7932 ;-- CL 1948, 390.341
